Literature.Title: An antibiotic fusaricidin: a cyclic depsipeptide from Paenibacillus polymyxa E681 induces systemic resistance against Phytophthora blight of red-pepper
Literature.Author: Lee SH, Cho YE, Park SH, Balaraju K, Park JW, Lee SW, Park K

Literature.Title: Fusaricidin A, a new depsipeptide antibiotic produced by Bacillus polymyxa KT-8. Taxonomy, fermentation, isolation, structure elucidation and biological activity.
Literature.Author: Kajimura Y, Kaneda M

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Rhizoctonia solani(MIC=>512µg/ml),Fusarium oxysporum(MIC=128µg/ml),Phytophthora capsici(MIC=16µg/ml),Colletotrichum acutatum(MIC=256µg/ml),Pythium ultimum(MIC=16µg/ml),Alternaria alternata(MIC=256µg/ml),Botrytis cinerea(MIC=32µg/ml),Sclerotinia sclerotiorum(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus FDA 209P(MIC=<0.78µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus Smith(MIC=<0.78µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus IFO 3333(MIC=<0.78µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=3.12µg/ml),Escherichia coli NIHJ(MIC=>100µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae KC-1(MIC=>100µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa IFO 3445(MIC=>100µg/ml),Serratia marcescens IFO 3736(MIC=>100µg/ml),Candida albicans IFO 1594(MIC=>100µg/ml),Saccharomyces cerevisiae HUT 7099(MIC=>100µg/ml),Fusarium oxysporum HF 8801(MIC=1.56µg/ml),Fusarium oxysporum HF 8835(MIC=1.56µg/ml),Aspergillus niger HUT 2016(MIC=3.12µg/ml),Aspergillus oryzae IFO 4214(MIC=3.12µg/ml),Penicillium thomii(MIC=3.12µg/ml)
